changeComposition(String, int) - Method in class battle_phases.ArmyBuild
 
changeUnit(UnitsEnum, int) - Method in class factors.Composition
 
choose() - Static method in class battle_phases.MainProgram
choose method asks user what scenario will program run, either console input, user will customize input for program (one simulation), or random, which makes every needed input random and gives user options like running more simulations and saving results to file.
chooseArmy() - Method in class battle_phases.ArmyBuild
chooseArmy method calls methods based on scenario, that will determine faction and composition of "army"
chooseRandomComposition(FactionEnum, Commander, boolean, ArmiesEnum) - Method in class factors.Composition
chooseRandomComposition method sets composition to random values, not entirely random though, there is guarantee that faction bonus and leaders specialization(if it's higher than average) put some base regiments into composition
